#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{  int t;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   { int n,k,b[1005],a[1000][1000]={0},i,j;
     cin>>n>>k;
     
     for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   	 cin>>b[i];
   	 
   	 a[0][0]=1;
   	 
	 for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
   	 for(j=0;j<=k;j++)
   	 if(a[i-1][j]==1 || (b[i]<=j && a[i-1][j-b[i]]==1))
   	  a[i][j]=1;
     
    /* for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
     {for(j=0;j<=k;j++)
       cout<<a[i][j]<<"  ";
       
       cout<<"\n";
	 }
    */
	cout<<a[n][k]<<"\n";
   }
	return 0;
}
